message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $120 to me, but I understand its value may be different for you. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $100. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to propose a counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to counteroffer at $90. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. I would like to counter your offer at $95. This brings us closer together while still respecting the value I place on the product.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $92. I believe this is a fair price given the value of the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I've considered your proposal carefully, and I would like to counter it at $93. This price respects both the value of the product and our ongoing negotiation.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. I would like to counteroffer at $91. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I've thought about it, and I would like to counter it at $92. This price reflects the value of the product while also considering our ongoing negotiation.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $90. I believe this is a fair price given the value of the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I would like to counter it at $91. This price respects the value of the product and our negotiation process.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counteroffer at $89. I believe this is a fair price given the value of the product.
